summary: Each year, we make more than 1,000 recommendations to help the federal government save money, address issues on our High Risk List , and significantly improve government operations. This letter to the Environmental Protection Agency outlines 15 open recommendations that it should prioritize. title: Priority Open Recommendations: Environmental Protection Agency
